6.11 Breakpoints

6.11.3 Browsing a project's breakpoints

You can see all of a project's breakpoints in the project window's Breakpoints page. This shows the location of the breakpoint (the name of the function or the line of the source code file),

You can also manipulate any breakpoint here by selecting it and using the commands on the shortcut (right-click) menu. See Section 6.11.4.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
